website_summaries.verdict: A bamboo peel with an easy-grip, 8-inch handle.
pros: This pizza peel features a large surface
Bamboo construction makes the peel a sustainable option with anti-bacterial properties
Pies come right off, so transferring them to a stone takes just a few seconds
cons: Users noticed cracks developing after a few uses
Some found the handle a bit wide

customer_reviews.title: Sliding your dough into the oven is A challenge with this one
customer_reviews.text: Because the surface is a bamboo finished surface, it is polished to a very smooth finishing. This makes sliding spread dough a challenge even when using ample flour and semolina. I am coming to this conclusion in comparison with another paddle made of hard wood with a wooden fine grainy finishing, which is perfect when sliding your pizza dough with both flour and semolina. I usually make two pizzas at a time and I prepare them on the 2 paddles in the same time. I suffer from sticky dough with the Norpro Bamboo, where as the other hardwood paddle slides into the oven like a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Almokhtar Bukhamsin

customer_reviews.title: My baking friend
customer_reviews.text: The heavy bamboo pizza peel is an excellent addition to my baking-ware. It is simple to maintain, and it is quite useful for all my baking purposes, particularly pizza. The bamboo does tend to grip on to the dough a bit too much, though. I've tried corn meal, bread flour, and AP flour to lubricate it, but it still does occasionally have a little bit of trouble coming off the peel. Even still, I have not had any disasters yet. It is essential for baking pizzas, making one's life a whole lot easier. I haven't tried any inverted cookie sheet methods before, but I am satisfied with this. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alec W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent paddle for baking bread with pizza stone
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is very sturdy and a good size for delivering bread to my hot pizza stone. Bamboo is fairly lightweight and holds up well with use. Setting the edge on the pizza stone has not harmed the bamboo and I'm able to shake the bread off. Wasn't as easy with a whole pizza, due to it being full of wet veggies and sauce.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly 4 years later the wood cracked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item four years ago, I’ve used it weekly from frozen pizzas to homemade. It worked well until tonight when I realized it had a crack right down the middle where two pieces of the bamboo meet. I occasionally oil and condtion the wood. I’m debating buying this particular one again but I’ll probably try a new one. It had a good run.
customer_reviews.author: V. K.

customer_reviews.title: nice pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a friend, so I have not used it personally and haven't heard a report from the friend yet, but I was pleased with the looks of it. I read that wood peels can be slightly tricky to slide under the pizza as opposed to the metal ones, but I still wanted a wood one. And I think it's all in the wrist technique to get the pizza on the peel! Came sealed in shrink wrap. My gift wrapping of it was entertaining. I'll update my review if I end up hearing feedback from my friend.
customer_reviews.author: W. Fox

customer_reviews.title: A great pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: With a little flour/cornmeal under the pizza, the pizza easily slides off onto my heated pizza stone. It is quite large and I like the fact that it is made from bamboo. It is a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: wolfie

customer_reviews.title: The Pizza Pro
customer_reviews.text: Great for making home-made pizzas. This paddle can be used for pizza to put in and take out of the oven. It is best used with a bit of cornmeal on the bottom to ensure the dough doesn't stick when you are putting it in the oven. Just make sure to remove the cornmeal after cooking. I have made about 25 pizzas since I bought it and it is holding up great. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ggraple

customer_reviews.title: One of the better paddles we've had.
customer_reviews.text: Like the quality and it's lasting so far (in this household of pizza fans). We usually go cheap on these, so I spent a bit more to get one that lasts. It's big enough that some people might not have a cupboard that fits it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wallevand

customer_reviews.title: ... had one of these paddles for several years with great results. This one was a gift
customer_reviews.text: Have had one of these paddles for several years with great results. This one was a gift, and my friends were very pleased. They had never used a pizza paddle before, but would not be without one again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J

customer_reviews.title: Cracked First Use
customer_reviews.text: Saw some other reviews about it cracking, and figured I could deal with it for awhile. However was not expecting it to happen on the first use. The wood paddles are supposed to be better for transferring pizzas, but returned this one and got a metal one. Looks great, and would probably be of good use for something that didn't have to touch 500 degree stone's, like a cheese/bread board.
customer_reviews.author: MrE

customer_reviews.title: Great for all pizza lovers
customer_reviews.text: We love using this pizza paddle for home-made pizzas. the bamboo really holds it's luster and makes for a nice solid yet smooth surface to slide wet pizza dough onto a pizza stone. We use this paddle for not just home made pizza's and pizza dough, but as an easy way to take frozen pizza out of the oven too. The board is also sturdy enough to use as a cutting board and serving surface, so no more need for pizza pans in your cabinets!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Newberry-Gillin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Useless
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks nice, and would make a good cutting board, but as a pizza peel, it is worthless. No matter what I use, flour, cornmeal, oil, etc, my dough always sticks to the darn thing. And it is too thick to get under the pizza to take it out without tearing the crap out of it. It will likely wind up in my fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: MattSub

customer_reviews.title: Italian Pizzaria at Home
customer_reviews.text: Great for my pizza parties! Nicely made, smooth and cleans up well. I don't let it sit in water and protected with a little olive oil.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Buyer

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: The pizza slides off easy onto the baking/grilling stone. When the pizza is done we use it as a spatula to get it off the stone and then cut the pizza right on it. We have used it eight or more times, so far no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pizza on the grill.
customer_reviews.text: We make Pizza on the grill from time to time, and transferring it was always a pain. This bamboo pizza paddle definitely makes life easier. I have used it about 10 times and have no complaints. It is holding up extremely well, and I would purchase it again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: T-town

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking,functional peel. The small amount of adhesive left from the label came off easily with a dab of citrus based solvent with no damage or staining.
customer_reviews.author: Upperfish

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pizza peel, sturdy, good quality, but it is a bit too heavy for me (have the man of the house help you!)
customer_reviews.author: Babia

customer_reviews.title: I love this Pizza Paddle
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine product. I use it for baking bread as well as pizza. With a little corn meal my bread dough or pizza slides easily between it and my heated baking stone. The only thing I didn't like was the small amount of adhesive left on one side from the sticker but thanks to another Amazon customer review I now know how to remove that so I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Lacy

customer_reviews.title: A necessary tool if you have a baking/pizza stone
customer_reviews.text: Product seems well made - though I don't like the fact that it is made in China. A "peel" is almost a necessity for baking pizza on a stone. I do not know how the wood compares to a metal one relative to ease of use, but the wood appealed to me more.
customer_reviews.author: Shark

customer_reviews.title: Great for pizza on the grill.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time tonight. We purchased it to use when we make pizzas on our stone on the grill. We put cornmeal on the peel under the pizza dough, and it slid right off onto the stone with minimal effort.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Duel use
customer_reviews.text: I have used my paddle several times and it works great. I even cut and serve the pizza on the paddle which eliminates a few dirty dishes. I always wanted one, but were a might pricy in the stores. This one was just the right price for just the right paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, but Didn't Hold Up.
customer_reviews.text: This peel was great for awhile, but eventually split down the middle. That said I used it more than most probably would, and I am hard on stuff. On the good side it's just the right size for the home cook, and I really like the the look of the bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Norpro Bamboo Pizza Paddle over two and a half years ago and continue to use it for my home made pizza. Its a great paddle, looks good and works well. I sprinkle it with a little corn meal before I place the dough on it to help the pizza slide off and onto the stone.
customer_reviews.author: Brontolo

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Excellent product. Easy transaction. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Nice paddle
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is pretty big! Works well, just dust some cornmeal on it and the pizza slides right off.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pizza!
customer_reviews.text: Quality was great and exactly as pictured and described. We used it the same day we received for making homemade pizza. Shipping fast.
customer_reviews.author: ROC

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It's super sturdy! I cook giant Costco pizzas so I needed something big enough to carry them and strong enough to hold them. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: London

customer_reviews.title: Works good, though it did end up showing up with ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good, though it did end up showing up with a crack down the middle that I didn't notice till after a couple uses. Luckily I have wood glue, clamps and scrapers, so I was able to repair it to almost new. Overall not bad though and I would likely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L

customer_reviews.title: Great investment! Super seller
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift, and he says its the handiest thing ever!!! He has started making pizza on the grill and this is just the ticket since he can't use a pan!! Great investment! Super seller! Fast shipper!
customer_reviews.author: stevenh641

customer_reviews.title: Ouch! Sharp handle edges
customer_reviews.text: Pick up this peel and it feels like 4 dull knives digging into your palm and fingers. The handle edges are NOT rounded (something that could have easily been done in the wood shop when the thing was being made). I'm not fond of the varnish finish either.
customer_reviews.author: Rupert

customer_reviews.title: Cant live without it!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for pizza and bread. It's large enough for a 12oz pizza dough (16 oz is a bit too much). I used a little corn meal to keep it from sticking and was able to easily slide the uncooked pizza onto a preheated pizza stone.
customer_reviews.author: alexei27

customer_reviews.title: Not just for hazing pledges!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed to find this could protect my hands from what I now understand to be unnecessary burns when removing pizzas from a 400 degree oven, and it actually works.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kepler

customer_reviews.title: Quality not great.
customer_reviews.text: Have to return. Came with a crack along one edge. Makes it dangerously sharp. Quality not great.
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it arrived split in half. I sent it back for credit
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: We make a lot of pizza at home. Getting a large pie in and out of the oven is now "a piece of cake" with this pizza peel. Nice looking and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: 2beekeepers

customer_reviews.title: Was great and then no so great
customer_reviews.text: This was a great paddle until it was used to get a hot pizza from the oven. Since this is what it was made to do, we were disappointed that it cracked the same night we used it for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Kirk

customer_reviews.title: very good size and durable
customer_reviews.text: very good size and extremely durable. Good value for the price. Can be used very well in my oven. Excellent item and would recommend this to anyone for their own use or for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Goods
customer_reviews.text: This would have been an awesome item had it not broken down one side. I didn't notice it was broken until I had occasion to use the paddle, but when I removed it from the plastic packaging, it was broken. As I had already recycled the box it arrived in, I could not return it. However, I mended the paddle with wood glue so It's functional now.
customer_reviews.author: Babet

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this peel, but I'm going to have to replace it.
customer_reviews.text: The peel itself is really very pretty, but it's just not going to work. First, it has split in several places, and will almost certainly self-destruct before long. Second, the handle is not very comfortable to work with. Third, and most importantly, it's simply too thick. You can offload loaves and pizzas into the oven, but getting them back off a baking stone is nearly impossible.
customer_reviews.author: John Joganic

customer_reviews.title: we use for decoration on the wall and it looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: Norpro 5683 Bamboo Pizza Paddle ...we use for decoration on the wall and it looks very nice
customer_reviews.author: LinL

customer_reviews.title: Moms paddle.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for mom she loves making pizzas. It's not to heavy for her. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: chadi bousleiman

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to the claims. Really nice design and easy to use. We have been enjoying using for homemade artisan bread and pizza.
customer_reviews.author: C. Louthain

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is brittle. When it arrived, it was halfway cracked along the bamboo veins. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Gom

customer_reviews.title: Multiuse Addition to your Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: As a n00b to pizza making, I'm not sure how this paddle measures up to other pizza paddles, but it certainly gets the job done. One thing I like about it is that since it is wood, you can cut the pizza right on it. Very convenient! No problems with this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Andersen

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE PIZZA PEEL
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pizza peel as a Christmas gift for my daughter. It is very nice and I'm sure she will enjoy it as it was one of the items on her list.
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: Not like my other pizza paddle
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this product. My other pizza paddle is awesome, but this one does not work so well. Even with using a lot of cornmeal on the paddle, the dough still sticks to it and then you end up with a pizza ball instead of a nice pizza. I hope that it gets better with age.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very good pizza paddle
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pizza paddle and was quite inexpensive. I would definitely buy this item again. It is a little on the large size but fits up against the wall of a kithen cupboard so doesn't take too much room!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Mackellar

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are pleased with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Orbanus

customer_reviews.title: A very nice single-pizza paddle
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent, inexpensive pizza paddle. A must-have item if you are making pizza from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Cunningham Jr.

customer_reviews.title: No good...
customer_reviews.text: Pizza peel split after first use! Gav eit to my parents for christmas and it split straight down a glued seem when used the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Kasten

customer_reviews.title: maybe it's user error, but i couldn't get a ...
customer_reviews.text: maybe it's user error, but i couldn't get a pizza to slide on, nor could i get it to slide off. absolutely no value or use to me
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and does the job well. It's just the right size for wood fired pizza out on the Big Green Egg. You really can't go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just want I've been wanting and for it to be bamboo is only a PLUS! Looking forward to getting more products!
customer_reviews.author: R Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I am really excited about the paddle!! I have wanted one for quite a while and it was worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Beaupre

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing the pros and cons of using a wooden peel versus a metal peel, I decided to go with this one. We used it for the very first time last night, and it split right down the middle in half. I know that wooden peels can crack at the tip, and need to be replaced eventually, but this didn't hold up at all.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this paddle is excellent. Makes a nice accessory for bread making or pizza making. I followed the directions before using and the dough doesn't stick to it when putting in the oven. Love this paddle.
customer_reviews.author: P. B

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: Bamboo is perfect for this use. Very happy with mine and I hope to use it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: great paddle
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great, well constructed, better than I expected, could hang in the kitchen just for decoration even if you never used it except to pass glasses of schnapps around the table
customer_reviews.author: Yossarian

customer_reviews.title: Can easily prepare pizza
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Can easily prepare pizza, , then slide it in and out of the oven without burning your hand or arm.
customer_reviews.author: Rummi2

customer_reviews.title: Really nice. Easy to slide off a pizza with little ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Easy to slide off a pizza with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Shell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Pizza Peel. works fantastic. Just load up on the corn meal and slides off nicely onto heated pizza stone. Works just as well in reverse taking the pizza off the stone. For $15 it's well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: TJ Mazzeo

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: All is fine good stuff and nice quality buy every time again.Can tell about that support is very nice and friendly....Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jens und Antje Kiebert

customer_reviews.title: broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: this paddle has many sections that have been glued together and on the first use it literally spit right down one of the sections. It is very beautiful but didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for both putting the large pizzas in the oven as well as getting them out without getting burned.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Kingslan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it...great quality....I'd have ya'll over for pizza but I don't know who's reading this review!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Now I can get pizzas out of the oven and off of the hotplate
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Davidicus

customer_reviews.title: Best Pizza Paddle Ever
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to handle...a little flour or corn meal on the paddle and the dough (pizza) slides right off. When pulling it out of the oven, again, it is easy to use and easy to clean. This is by far the best pizza paddle I have ever owned and the size is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: velma lucero-garcia

customer_reviews.title: Puts our home made pizza where we want it!
customer_reviews.text: Yes this puts our home made pizza where we want to put it in the oven or pull it from the oven when baked.
customer_reviews.author: bookreview

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I make my own bread at least once every two weeks so this comes in handy! Its the perfect size for the loaves I make. The only problem is that the glue the company uses to adhere the paper instructions/label won't come off the board whatever I've tried so I have only used one side of this.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie S.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: This certainly does what I want it to do and it needs to have some weight to it to accomplish the task but wish I'd paid more attention to how much it weighs by itself prior to purchasing. It is 2# all by itself thus making moving pizza or dough in and out of a very hot oven a little tricky because of the weight. I need both hands for the transfers.
customer_reviews.author: servant

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for a gift for my sister-in-law. She ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a gift for my sister-in-law. She has had two pizza parties and has used it both times.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza peel
customer_reviews.text: Great pizza peel, good price, and looks good too. It's 14" wide ,same as my pizza stone so it's easy to size my pizza to fit the stone when stretching the dough out on it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: best pizza paddle/peal ever
customer_reviews.text: love this pizza paddle, comes clean every time. nice finish. takes pizza cutting without cutting the board. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am going to make bagels and this is just what I need. Thank you for the fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Diane Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and hand length for me. Easy to wash. I use it all the time for frozen pizza!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lester

customer_reviews.title: review of handy bamboo pizza paddle
customer_reviews.text: I had a lightweight wooden one that I used all the time. It fell on the floor and broke in half. So I ordered a new one. It was just what I wanted and it came very quickly through the mail.
customer_reviews.author: tk johnson

customer_reviews.title: pizza paddle
customer_reviews.text: Good price shopped around was no better deal. Good size works great for pizza on the grill or out of your oven!
customer_reviews.author: grahamd

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a pizza paddle for years. I kept looking at restaurant supply stores but then thought about Amazon and found the perfect one. He loves it!!! We had a football party and everyone went crazy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Gena Barker

customer_reviews.title: Solid Deal
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice quality inexpensive pizza peel and this one is what I decided to buy. So far I've been perfectly happy with it. It seems solid and well made. As far as being a pizza moving device, it works fine if used properly.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Robert

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about two months. It makes the baking process so easy. Customers should know that there is a technique to using theis product, but once you get that down its great !
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cortese

customer_reviews.title: Blunt edge
customer_reviews.text: The edge of the paddle is a bit blunt and hard to get under the pizza before it is cooked. I have never used a pizza paddle before so it may be a learing curve in it's use. Handle is also a bit short. Good for one hand but need two with a heavy pizza on it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Needed this!
customer_reviews.text: The paddle is a great necessity in order to slide the pizza onto the very hot Emile Henry Baking stone on the grill. This is a must in order to get a crisp crust or at least one cooked through.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so much that I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hare

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Paddle
customer_reviews.text: The pizza paddle is just as advertized. It is sturdy and easily handles a 16" pie. Since it takes a lot of room but is good looking, I store it in plain sight standing up on the kitchen counter near a window. This is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Pulchin

customer_reviews.title: Works as you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: Picks up my pizza with ease. Perfect size for the Costco Take-and-Bake pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Snorticus M.

customer_reviews.title: I love my pizza paddle
customer_reviews.text: I love this paddle! I have had paddles in the past but this one is much sturdier and easy to clean. I was surprised by its size and thickness if the handle. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: DHE

customer_reviews.title: about a year & I have no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for bread for about a year & have no complaints. Perfect size & good quality, works as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made and durable pizza / bread peel. I have used it at least once a week for a year with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Akunin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Split in half only a few months of use - and did not put in dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh Roehl

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This pizza paddle works great with the pizza stone I purchased. And, it provides an additional work surface for many other tasks. I'm now able to make great thin crust pizza.
customer_reviews.author: AVan

customer_reviews.title: Two fold uses.
customer_reviews.text: I try to use one side for a cutting board and for slicing the pizza and the other for the actual pizza.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Great Peel
customer_reviews.text: Works great with a little corn meal lightly scattered before placing the dough on the peel. The ordering process was very satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, love it. But still mastering sliding the pizza on and off. Not sure if it's me or the edge could be skinnier.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The size is just right for our small pizza oven but awkward to store....ended hanging them.
customer_reviews.author: Norman M. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: works great.
customer_reviews.text: Large pan. Is super slick . you just slide your pizza in out. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: John Swanberg

customer_reviews.title: great for lots of uses
customer_reviews.text: Like this bamboo pizza paddle. It is a perfect size. I hung it in my kitchen. It is also pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I also use it for serving the pizza. I would recommend to friends for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Livesay

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: It is of good quality and I enjoy using it, but the handles edges should have been rounded to make it more ergonomic to your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these. Really like the paddle. The size is perfect. However one of the paddles cracked after only my third use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kulpa

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Paddle
customer_reviews.text: I love this pizza paddle, it's jus the right size and works perfectly. You can also use it as a cutting board. It's also a nice decorative piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Saine

product_meta.title: Norpro Bamboo Pizza Paddle, 14 × 16, Brown
feature_bullets: Tapered-edge paddle slips easily beneath pizza crusts and doubles as a beautiful cutting board/server
Eco-friendly natural bamboo construction with beautiful wood grain and rounded edges.Natural Bamboo may contain flaws and imperfections, that do not affect product performance and functionality.
8-inch handle keeps hands away from heat source; hanging loop offers quick accessibility
Hand wash and dry thoroughly; rub frequently with food-grade oil to preserve luster

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars359 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
